body: For the `forbidden-sandbox-reinit` problem, you can find solution in https://github.com/alexeyst/node-webkit-macappstore/issues/1.

@zcbenz Thank you for the quick response! Actually I had done some searching before submitting this issue, and I followed that link to change the bundle id of three helpers to `com.github.electron` but it didn't work. I still got the same error.

Additionally, I run the following command to test the signature:

``` shell
$ spctl --ignore-cache --no-cache --assess --type execute --verbose=4 sign/Electron.app/Contents/Frameworks/Electron\ Helper.app
sign/Electron.app/Contents/Frameworks/Electron Helper.app: accepted
override=security disabled
```

It seems that there's no problem with it. I used another computer to sign the app and got the same result. I wonder whether it's a electron specified issue.
Find another related issue mentioned in https://github.com/nwjs/nw.js/issues/3609: https://bitbucket.org/chromiumembedded/cef/issues/1204

The "Application Specific Information" section shows the error is `Could not set sandbox profile data: Operation not permitted (1)`. I did some searching and only found a related question in stackoverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19765237/nstask-from-sandboxed-helper-app-fails-with-could-not-set-sandbox-profile-data.

Hope this information helps!

@mecee The signing tool of OS X changes between different versions, you can probably try signing on old OS X versions like 10.10, there are also many people succeeded to sign their apps, so you might also be able to get answers from [the community](https://github.com/atom/electron#community).
I'm having the same problem. Did you find a solution?
Hi,mecee. Do you have a solution for this problem?

I got this from MAS submit, should I use --deep when codesigning?
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1049575/26618015/e2e33930-460a-11e7-91eb-70a970503825.png)
@hzlzh If you package your app into an `asar` the app store won't detect those files as executable 👍

![untitled-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1049575/26619178/dd62f4a0-460f-11e7-9cf4-b1c8fcc14865.png)
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1049575/26619200/f202e12c-460f-11e7-8ef5-eab5e3a89358.png)

I package it into a pkg file, and submit to MAS via Application Loader, It that ok?

sign.sh below.
```bash
#!/bin/bash

# Name of your app.
APP="WeFlow"
# The path of your app to sign.
APP_PATH="/Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app"
# The path to the location you want to put the signed package.
RESULT_PATH="/Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/$APP.pkg"
# The name of certificates you requested.
APP_KEY="3rd Party Mac Developer Application: ZiLi Huang (UAEM649DN3)"
INSTALLER_KEY="3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: ZiLi Huang (UAEM649DN3)"

# The path of your plist files.
CHILD_PLIST="/Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/child.plist"
PARENT_PLIST="/Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/parent.plist"

FRAMEWORKS_PATH="$APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks"

codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/Electron Framework.framework/Versions/A/Electron Framework"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/Electron Framework.framework/Versions/A/Libraries/libffmpeg.dylib"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/Electron Framework.framework/Versions/A/Libraries/libnode.dylib"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/Electron Framework.framework"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/$APP Helper.app/Contents/MacOS/$APP Helper"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/$APP Helper.app/"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/$APP Helper EH.app/Contents/MacOS/$APP Helper EH"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/$APP Helper EH.app/"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/$APP Helper NP.app/Contents/MacOS/$APP Helper NP"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$FRAMEWORKS_PATH/$APP Helper NP.app/"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --entitlements "$CHILD_PLIST" "$APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP"
codesign -s "$APP_KEY" -f --deep --entitlements "$PARENT_PLIST" "$APP_PATH"
electron-osx-sign /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app/Contents/Resources/app/node_modules/cwebp-bin/vendor/cwebp
electron-osx-sign /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app/Contents/Resources/app/node_modules/gifsicle/vendor/gifsicle
electron-osx-sign /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app/Contents/Resources/app/node_modules/jpegtran-bin/vendor/jpegtran
electron-osx-sign /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app/Contents/Resources/app/node_modules/optipng-bin/vendor/optipng
electron-osx-sign /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app/Contents/Resources/app/node_modules/phantomjs-prebuilt/lib/phantom/bin/phantomjs
electron-osx-sign /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app /Users/hzlzh/project/WeFlow/dist/1.3.3/WeFlow-mas-x64/WeFlow.app/Contents/Resources/app/node_modules/pngquant-bin/vendor/pngquant

productbuild --component "$APP_PATH" /Applications --sign "$INSTALLER_KEY" "$RESULT_PATH"
```
